ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body + <2> Nikon 18-140mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <5> Spare EN-EL15 Battery + <6> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote +
<7> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <8> PD 67mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <9> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <12> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D7100 Digital SLR Camera Body with 18-140mm VR Lens + 64GB Card + Case + Battery + Tripod + 3 Filters Kit
